Hello.

What about testing over a TEST DB which it's stat=
e is always known.

Each test that runs, ROLLBACK the changes made.

Meanin=
g - testing the insert method for instance, will not change the state
of th=
e DB.

This way, i always know the state of the DB, and i dont have to buil=
d a
complicated fixture to run a test

that checks how many rows i have in =
Emp table for example.
